text: Moussa Kounfolo Yeo (born 1 June 2004) is a Malian football player. He plays for FC Liefering in Austria's second league as midfielder on loan from FC Red Bull Salzburg. == Career== Yeo started his career with Guidars FC in Mali. In August 2022 he went to FC Red Bull Salzburg in the Austrian Bundesliga.Neues Talent aus Mali f√ºr unsere Roten Bullen (German) He was then loaned to FC Liefering in the Second league. He debuted for Liefering in 19 August 2022 versus SKU Amstetten where he was part of the starting team. In April 2023 he made his debut in Salzburg's professional squad against SK Sturm Graz. ==References== Category:2004 births Category:Living people Category:Malian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Liefering players
title: Moussa Kounfolo Yeo
